name: 壹仟 One Thousand
description:
This is a short 2D Interactive fiction game made during BuddyUp Jam 2022 Spring.

Players will explore the mystery of her mother and discover the ancient mystery of the village.

                         note                                 

This game is currently in English only and is on Developing

We will add the Chinese version later.

                         credit
